snippet: Las Vegas Sands, the casino operator controlled by the billionaire Sheldon G. Adelson and his family, is facing a new, $375 million lawsuit over how the company won a lucrative gambling license in Macau.
abstract: Las Vegas Sands, the casino operator controlled by the billionaire Sheldon G. Adelson and his family, is facing a new, $375 million lawsuit over how the company won a lucrative gambling license in Macau.

headline.main: Las Vegas Sands Faces $375 Million Suit by Former Macau Partner
